derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French generalite, from late Latin generalitas, from generalis (see general)

entry.def: A generality is a general statement that covers a range of things, rather than being concerned with specific instances.

example.ex: I'll start with some generalities and then examine a few specific examples...
example.tran: 我首先进行概述，然后会分析几个实例。

example.ex: He avoided this tricky question and talked in generalities.
example.tran: 他回避了这个非常微妙的问题，只做了个笼统的表述。

entry.def: The generality of a statement or description is the fact that it is a general one, rather than a specific, detailed one.

example.ex: That there are problems with this kind of definition is hardly surprising, given its level of generality.
example.tran: 由于其笼统性，不难料想这种定义会存在问题。

entry.def: If someone refers to the generality of a group of people, they mean the majority of that group.

example.ex: When the generality of the electorate is doing badly, the mood will grow pessimistic.
example.tran: 当多数选民都不予以支持时，情绪就会变得悲观起来。

means.word_mean: 2. the quality of being general or widespread or having general applicability

auth_sentence.content: The subsequent words...did not restrain the generality of the former words.
auth_sentence.res_content: The subsequent words...did not restrain the generality of the former words.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The subsequent words...did not restrain the generality of the former words.

auth_sentence.content: When an epitaph is very short, it is in danger of getting into a cold generality.
auth_sentence.res_content: When an epitaph is very short, it is in danger of getting into a cold generality.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: When an epitaph is very short, it is in danger of getting into a cold generality.

auth_sentence.content: What is taught is largely immaterial to what is needed. Instead, teach generality and essential social skills.
auth_sentence.res_content: What is taught is largely immaterial to what is needed. Instead, teach generality and essential social skills.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: What is taught is largely immaterial to what is needed. Instead, teach generality and essential social skills.

Sentence.sentence: Declaring that one country is better than another in the way that it treats more than half its citizens means relying on broad strokes and generalities.

sentences.en: I wish you would come down from generalities to particulars.
sentences.cn: 我希望你别谈大概而谈细节。

means.word_mean: 一般性,通(用)性;概括性,笼统性
